Title: Allows absentee voting for persons unable to vote due to duties, occupation, business, personal matters or studies
Summary: Allows absentee voting for persons unable to vote due to duties, occupation, business, personal matters or studies; no agent may collect more than 15 ballots except with approval of two inspectors representing different political parties.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to absentee voting qualifications
